nodes.text: Tigmary was a spice used to enhance the flavor of various meals including Bantha rump. The four-armed chef, Gormaanda, provided instructional holovids including tips on how to properly use this food additive for various meals. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the Wookiee, Mallatobuck, used liberal helpings of this item when preparing a special Life Day Bantha Surprise  dinner for her husband, Chewbacca. A tigmary rub down was also given to Gamorrean Pork served at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant.
